spell_tooltip.description:
You have a chance to become Enraged while you are suffering movement impairing effects.

Suffering loss of control effects have a chance to grant you Recklessness for 5 sec.
Increases your damage taken and done by 10% for 15 sec at the cost of 10% of your health. Stacks up to 5 times.

Spell Reflection reflects the next 2 incoming spells cast on you and reflected spells deal 100% extra damage to the attacker.

Spell Reflection's cooldown is increased by 10 sec.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.

Your auto-attacks generate 20% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 78,859 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 30,649 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 37,696 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Rampage has a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 26,305 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Your auto-attacks have a 20% chance to hurl weapons at your target and 3 other enemies in front of you, dealing an additional 33,083 Physical damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 12% and movement speed is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 20%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 327,413 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 442,045 physical damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Activating Avatar or Recklessness grants 8 sec of the other.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 518,040 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 10 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 562,582 Physical damage.

Raging Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.

Generates 14 Rage.
Enrage increases your Haste by 15% and increases your movement speed by 10%.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
Your attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown of Execute and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 672,861 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 160,336 health over 6 sec.
Bloodthirst deals 100% increased damage to enemies who are below 35% health.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Execute increases the critical strike chance of Execute by 10% for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 16 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Mastery increased by 4% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 2.0 sec.
Haste increased by 4% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 4 Rage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1.5 million Physical damage over 3.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Generates 10 Rage each time you deal damage.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Your attacks against your primary target have a high chance to overwhelm their defenses and trigger a Slayer's Strike, dealing 445,488 damage and applying Marked for Execution, increasing the damage they take from your next Execute by 15%. Stacks 3 times.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Rampage after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
Bloodthirst critical strikes increase the damage of your next Bloodthirst by 20%.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.
Bloodthirst has a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 487,274 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Raging Blow damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 77,979 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 30,959 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 37,566 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 161,364 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 26,567 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 10% and Armor increased by 10%.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 6% and movement speed is increased by 4%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 20%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Roar explosively, dealing 325,064 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 442,045 physical damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
While Avatar is active Rampage's Rage cost is reduced by 20 and Bloodthirst's cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 518,731 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 10 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 550,205 Physical damage.

Raging Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.

Generates 14 Rage.
Enrage increases the damage your abilities deal by an additional 15% and Enrage's duration is increased by 1 sec.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst always Enrages you the first time you strike a target and it has a 15% increased chance to trigger Enrage.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
Your attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown of Execute and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 681,453 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 160,336 health over 6 sec.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.

Whirlwind causes your next 2 single-target attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 55% damage.

Whirlwind generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit. Maximum 8 Rage.
Your Bleed effects deal 20% additional damage.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 16 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Whirlwind deals 25% more damage and affects your next 4 single-target attacks.
Mastery increased by 4% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 2.0 sec.
Critical Strike chance increased by 2% and Raging Blow's critical strikes deal 10% increased damage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1.4 million Physical damage over 3.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Generates 10 Rage each time you deal damage.

Activating Recklessness generates 50 Rage and while Recklessness is active, Raging Blow and Bloodthirst are replaced by Crushing Blow and Bloodbath.

 Crushing Blow
Strike a mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 660,712 Physical damage. 

Crushing Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown and its critical strikes deal 20% additional damage.

Generates 14 Rage.

 Bloodbath
Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 622,230 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Bloodbath causes the target to bleed for 79,178 damage over 6 sec. Using Bloodbath on a target that is affected by Bloodbath extends the bleed by 6 sec.

Generates 10 Rage.

Unleashes your power, dealing 722,893 Physical damage and an additional 281,373 Physical damage over 4 sec to all enemies within 12 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 15 Rage.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Odyn's Fury's Enrages you, deals 10% increased damage and grants you 2 stacks of Whirlwind.

Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by 5%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%, and it generates 8 Rage. 

Seismic Reverberations, Improved Whirlwind, Meat Cleaver, and Barbaric Training now affect Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
Lightning Strikes also deal 58,862 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 15%.

Bloodthirst and Rampage damage increased by 25%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage and generates 2 Rage.
Storm Bolt also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning them for 2 sec, but its cooldown is increased by 10 sec.
